true.prompt: The chiropractor down the street from your house loves you. You are keeping the office in business because this is your third visit for the month. You have been sleeping on an old futon with squeaky springs because you refuse to commit to your partner. It's time to make up your mind
outcomes: That back wasn't holding up eh ? Smart Choice. Great News ! You no longer pay a deductible to the chiropractor. However. you now have to go half on an extravagant wedding.

Your partner wanted revenge and blackmailed the chiropractor to never take you on as a client. You are officially single with a bad back. A friend has offered rent their shed to you behind the house for a few weeks.

true.prompt: You go to your partner to build an addition onto your house. Your partner tells you to wait until next year, but the time to build is now. You decide to go to the bank anyways and check your account. To your surprise, your partner has put all of the money into forex.
outcomes: Wrong choice ! Your partner is now a millionaire. Forex worked well for them. You officially need to see a cardiologist because of a broken heart.
Put your hands in the air-- the police caught you before you could pull out your gun. There was a grandmom at the bank who hit you knee with her cane.  Bail money is set to $10,000. Your scuffed

false.prompt: You're at a NYE party and the countdown to midnight is approaching. You are feeling nervous because you have no partner to kiss. Suddenly, you lock eyes with a mysterious wide-eye stranger.  'OoOoOo I like,' you think. What do you do?
outcomes: Wow, what a magical kiss. The honeymoon stage begins. You cannot believe your luck. Sam is an incredibly kisser who also enjoys anime like you. You ask them to be your partner and they accept.

You are too shy to approach the stranger. You are feeling self-conscious because you have been dancing all night and have pit stains. You quietly leave into the night...wondering if you will ever fine romance. Sigh.
